page.title: 08Farming in South Brent (1)
page.content: {23 farmers were asked to provide data. {The survey is based on responses from: { Zeal Farm (Mr Savage) Lower Downstow (Mr Hayter) Higher Downstow (Mr Anderson) Yalland (Mr Lane) Overbrent (Mr Luscombe) Zempson (Mr Andrews) Gisperdown (Miss Codd) Stippadon (Mr Hallett) Marley Grange (Mr Pawke) Court Gate Farm (Mr Mabin- owner) Court Gate Farm (Mr Norrish- tenant) Tor Park (Mrs Wakeham) Lutton (Mr & Mrs Warren) Furze Pen (Mr Friendship) Higher Beara (Mr Vooght) Inglenook (Mr Tidball) Stidston (Mr Cleave) Homer Stidston (Mr Coaker)
